sections.paragraph: as far as, even to, until, up to, while, as far as

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Properly the same as H5703 (used as a preposition, adverb or conjugation; especially with a preposition); as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with): - against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for (-asmuch as), [hither-] to, + how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, (+ as) yet.
Cognate: H5703, H5704, H5706, H5710, H5728
